content: Hey! I've nominated the RFC to be discussed at our next Libs meeting, which is going to be on 2020-10-14T20:00:00Z It'd be good for us to try get across it too, even though the initial public surface area can be kept very small

It'd be great @Jack Wrenn if you'd be able to make it too, but for Libs we can try look mostly at it from an API perspective, which will hopefully not be too much repeating yourself from the lang discussions
@Ashley Mannix I'd be delighted to join!
